replies.body:
why do people post things like this on the boards? the boards are moderated and managed by a 3rd party. RIOT does not directly run the boards. so posting your appeal of a ban is pointless here. 

there is a system in placed to submit a support ticket. i highly suggest you do that and they will review your case and im willing to bet its gonna still end in a ban. 

but best of luck

Some players seek clarification of their ban with the community. I'd say Reds and Arbiters comment pretty frequently for people's chat logs. I don't know the %, but it's >>>2%.

If we're just talking about Riot Tantram, I'd venture about 10%.

lol regardless the best way to dispute something is to SUBMIT A SUPPORT TICKET

{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us and choose >Submit a Request >I Have a Question about League of Legends/Riot games >Category >Game and Features >General Questions.

I'm going to go with the fact there have been times when a Red has commented on these threads and potentially changed a punishment, or simply smited the OP with the full log/ info on previous punishments.

out of the # of these post and the times that a RED did responded for or against the OP is like maybe (and im gonna go with a high estimate ) of about 2%

but its still a waste of time.. as i explained use the support ticket submit your case and they will review it

And I agree with you Mr.Sunshine.   They are better off sending support ticket as you suggested.

I just wanted to answer why they post here. xD
filed a support ticket, thanks for the help guys.

I took a look at these chat logs. 

You do say "kys" although save one instance, it doesn't seem to be directed at a player. You also state that you are giving up to the enemy team. Additionally, you call for reports against Fizz. Calling for reports can be considered harassment at times, especially if Fizz didn't say %%%%, so please be careful with calling for reports. This overall doesn't seem too toxic towards Fizz or Vayne and might not be punishable. This leads me to believe that 1) there are logs missing from your in-game report card or 2) you have edited chat from this game.

Regardless, you should submit a player support [ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) if you feel your ban is unjust.

----------------------------------------------
As a reminder, the MSI icon is on sale for 1 IP! Represent your region!

thanks, the person playing vayne is my friend in real life and we were in the same room when all of this happened. and as for our Fizz he kept calling us %%%s and told me to suck a cock and kept saying "kys". As for the surrender we were losing really bad and the enemy team wasn't winning on purpose so they could keep killing us, as you can imagine that isn't much fun and I didn't want to abandon the game. we tried to vote to surrender twice and both times lost 3/2 until I finally asked them if they'd stop spawn killing and just end the game so we could find a new lobby instead of just dying over and over. besides that I did nothing wrong and it's kind of BS that I get banned for 2 weeks for no reason. 

Thanks though for the help!! just thought I'd elaborate more on what happened and why I said those things.
also that isn't the whole chat log, it's the chat log Riot gave me when they sent me my ban notice. the rest of the chat is literally just callouts or me talking to vayne.

certainly a bad idea to repeat those slurs.

It's not like you need to rally for reports, 1 report is good enough to flag the system to check for toxicity, anymore is just redundant.

Besides, asking for reports can sometimes become a harassment tool and thus will end up getting you punished over lots of games.

eitherway, hit up riot's support and see if they can help you.
